description:
Gigalt worked in Technora`s Debris Section until two years before the current timeline of the series starts. Later worked in the OSA (Orbital Security Agency).
He`s the man who trained both Hachimaki and Hakim, their Senpai. Also a close friend of Hachimaki`s father Goro, they were both part of the first manned mission to Mars.
name: Gigalt Gangaragash
